markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Emotional Surge](/Feats.aspx?ID=3679) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Emotion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=60" />
<trait label="Psyche" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=429" />
<trait label="Psychic" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=430" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Dark Archive](/Sources.aspx?ID=129) pg. 27</row>

**Prerequisites**
[emotional acceptance](/SubconsciousMinds.aspx?ID=1) subconscious mind

**Requirements**
[emotional acceptance](/SubconsciousMinds.aspx?ID=1) subconscious mind

</column>

---

Your heart soars, increasing your power for a moment. You gain a +2 status bonus to attack rolls and skill checks until the start of your next turn.
name: Emotional Surge
